en: Narrator: Today Peppa and her family are going for a drive in their red car.
cn: 旁白：今天佩奇和她的家人要开着他们的红车去兜风。

en: Daddy Pig: Shall we have the roof down?
cn: 猪爸爸：我们要把车顶打开吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, please.
cn: 佩奇：要，谢谢。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George love their car.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治都很喜欢他们的车。

en: Daddy Pig: Is everybody ready?
cn: 猪爸爸：大家都准备好了吗？

examples.en: Is everybody in the car?
Is everybody happy?

en: Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig: Ready.
cn: 猪妈妈、佩奇：准备好了。

en: Daddy Pig: Then let’s go.
cn: 猪爸爸：那我们出发吧。

en: Peppa Pig: I love our car.
cn: 佩奇：我喜欢我们的车。

en: Daddy Pig: And our car loves us, too. Don’t you?
cn: 猪爸爸：我们的车也喜欢我们，对吧？

en: Narrator: Oh, dear. The car does not sound very well.
cn: 旁白：哦，糟糕。车子听起来不太好。

sentence.en: The car does not sound very well.

examples.en: The engine does not sound very well.
The music does not sound very well.

en: Peppa Pig: What’s wrong, Daddy?
cn: 佩奇：怎么了，爸爸？

en: Daddy Pig: I don’t know.
cn: 猪爸爸：我不知道。

en: Mummy Pig: Let’s take it to Granddad Dog’s garage. He can fix it.
cn: 猪妈妈：我们去狗爷爷的修车厂吧，他能修好。

en: Daddy Pig: That’s a good idea, Mummy Pig.
cn: 猪爸爸：好主意，猪妈妈。

en: Narrator: Granddad Dog runs the garage. He is very good at mending cars.
cn: 旁白：狗爷爷经营着修车厂，他很擅长修车。

en: Granddad Dog: Oh, dear, Daddy Pig. Your car does not seem very well.
cn: 狗爷爷：哎呀，猪爸爸，你的车好像不太好。

sentence.en: Your car does not seem very well.

examples.en: Your bike does not seem very well.
examples.cn: 你的自行车好像不太好。

examples.en: Your computer does not seem very well.

en: Daddy Pig: Can you fix it please, Granddad Dog?
cn: 猪爸爸：狗爷爷，你能帮忙修一下吗？

en: Granddad Dog: Yes, but it will take all day.
cn: 狗爷爷：可以，但要一整天。

examples.en: It will take all morning.
It will take all week.

en: Daddy Pig, Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: Oh.
cn: 猪爸爸、猪妈妈、佩奇、乔治：哦。

en: Peppa Pig: We wanted to go for a drive in our car.
cn: 佩奇：我们本来想开车兜风的。

sentence.en: We wanted to go for a drive in our car.
sentence.cn: 我们本来想开车兜风的。

examples.en: We wanted to go for a walk in the park.
examples.cn: 我们本来想去公园散步的。

examples.en: We wanted to go for a picnic.

en: Granddad Dog: Don’t worry. You can borrow this new car while I fix yours.
cn: 狗爷爷：别担心，你们可以先用这辆新车，我来修你们的车。

sentence.en: You can borrow this new car while I fix yours.
sentence.cn: 你们可以先用这辆新车，我来修你们的车。

examples.en: You can borrow my umbrella while I fix yours.
examples.cn: 你可以先用我的伞，我来修你的。

examples.en: You can borrow my book while I fix yours.
examples.cn: 你可以先用我的书，我来修你的。

en: Daddy Pig, Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: Hurrah!
cn: 猪爸爸、猪妈妈、佩奇、乔治：万岁！

en: Daddy Pig: Thank you, Granddad Dog.
cn: 猪爸爸：谢谢你，狗爷爷。

en: Granddad Dog: Would you like the roof down?
cn: 狗爷爷：要把车顶打开吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, please.
cn: 佩奇：要，谢谢。

en: Granddad Dog: I’ll just press this red button.
cn: 狗爷爷：我按一下这个红色按钮。

en: Narrator: What a clever car.
cn: 旁白：多聪明的车啊。

examples.en: What a clever dog.
What a clever kid.

en: Daddy Pig, Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: Wow.
cn: 猪爸爸、猪妈妈、佩奇、乔治：哇。

en: Granddad Dog: When you come back, I will have fixed your car.
cn: 狗爷爷：等你们回来，我就把车修好了。

sentence.en: I will have fixed your car.

examples.en: I will have cleaned the house.
examples.cn: 我就把房子打扫干净了。

examples.en: I will have finished my homework.

en: Daddy Pig: Thank you, Granddad Dog. Goodbye.
cn: 猪爸爸：谢谢你，狗爷爷。再见。

en: Mummy Pig: Goodbye.
cn: 猪妈妈：再见。

en: Peppa Pig: Bye-bye.
cn: 佩奇：再见。

en: Granddad Dog: Goodbye.
cn: 狗爷爷：再见。

en: Narrator: Peppa and her family like the new blue car.
cn: 旁白：佩奇一家很喜欢这辆新蓝车。

en: Daddy Pig: There’s so many buttons in this new car.
cn: 猪爸爸：这辆新车有好多按钮。

sentence.en: There’s so many buttons in this new car.

examples.en: There’s so many toys in this new box.
examples.cn: 这个新盒子里有好多玩具。

examples.en: There’s so many books in this new library.
examples.cn: 这个新图书馆里有好多书。

en: Peppa Pig: What does the green button do, Daddy?
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，绿色按钮是干什么的？

sentence.en: What does the green button do

examples.en: What does the red table do?
What does the yellow light do?

en: Daddy Pig: Let’s see.
cn: 猪爸爸：让我看看。

en: Peppa Pig: Magic windows.
cn: 佩奇：魔法车窗。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, make the magic windows go down.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，让魔法车窗降下来。

en: Peppa Pig: What does the blue button do?
cn: 佩奇：蓝色按钮是干什么的？

en: Daddy Pig: I don’t know. Let’s see.
cn: 猪爸爸：我不知道，让我看看。

en: Peppa Pig: I love this new car. Can we keep it?
cn: 佩奇：我喜欢这辆新车，我们能留下它吗？

examples.en: Can we keep the puppy?
Can we keep the toy?
examples.cn: 我们能留下这个玩具吗？

en: Mummy Pig: No, we can’t keep it, Peppa. We’ve only borrowed it for today.
cn: 猪妈妈：不行，佩奇，我们只是借一天。

sentence.en: We’ve only borrowed it for today.

examples.en: We’ve only borrowed it for the weekend.
We’ve only borrowed it for a week.

en: Peppa Pig and George: Oh.
cn: 佩奇和乔治：哦。

en: Mummy Pig: Oh, no. I think it’s going to rain.
cn: 猪妈妈：哦，不。我觉得要下雨了。

sentence.en: I think it’s going to rain.

examples.en: I think it’s going to snow.
I think it’s going to be sunny.

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, I’ll just put the roof up.
cn: 猪爸爸：是的，我把车顶关上。

en: Daddy Pig: Now, which is the button to close the roof?
cn: 猪爸爸：现在，哪个按钮是关车顶的？

sentence.en: Which is the button to close the roof?

examples.en: Which is the button to open the door?
Which is the button to turn on the light?

en: Daddy Pig: Whoops. Silly me. Ah ha! This must be the button.
cn: 猪爸爸：哎呀，我真糊涂。啊哈！一定是这个按钮。

examples.en: This must be the right way.
This must be the answer.

en: Narrator: The new car has squirted Daddy Pig with water.
cn: 旁白：新车喷水到猪爸爸身上了。

en: Peppa Pig: Silly Daddy. That’s not the roof.
cn: 佩奇：傻爸爸，那不是关车顶的。

en: Daddy Pig: This button.
cn: 猪爸爸：这个按钮。

en: Daddy Pig: Whoops. Not that one.
cn: 猪爸爸：哎呀，不是这个。

en: Daddy Pig: This button.
cn: 猪爸爸：这个按钮。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig has forgotten which button closes the roof.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸忘了哪个按钮关车顶。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig has forgotten which button closes the roof.
sentence.cn: 猪爸爸忘了哪个按钮关车顶。

examples.en: Daddy Pig has forgotten which button opens the door.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸忘了哪个按钮开门。

examples.en: Daddy Pig has forgotten which button turns on the light.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸忘了哪个按钮开灯。

en: Daddy Pig: I don’t think this car likes me.
cn: 猪爸爸：我觉得这辆车不喜欢我。

en: Mummy Pig: Let’s try the red button.
cn: 猪妈妈：试试红色按钮吧。

en: Daddy Pig, Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: Hurrah!
cn: 猪爸爸、猪妈妈、佩奇、乔治：万岁！

en: Mummy Pig: But now it’s stopped raining.
cn: 猪妈妈：不过现在雨停了。

examples.en: Now it’s stopped snowing.
Now it’s stopped being windy.

en: Peppa Pig: Can we open the roof again?
cn: 佩奇：我们能再打开车顶吗？

en: Daddy Pig: Yes. Which button was it?
cn: 猪爸爸：可以，哪个按钮？

en: Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: The red one.
cn: 猪妈妈、佩奇、乔治：红色的。

en: Daddy Pig, Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: Hurrah!
cn: 猪爸爸、猪妈妈、佩奇、乔治：万岁！

en: Narrator: Granddad Dog has fixed the car.
cn: 旁白：狗爷爷把车修好了。

en: Granddad Dog: Your car is fixed.
cn: 狗爷爷：你的车修好了。

en: Daddy Pig, Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig, George: Hurrah!
cn: 猪爸爸、猪妈妈、佩奇、乔治：万岁！

en: Daddy Pig: Thank you, Granddad Dog. Keep the change.
cn: 猪爸爸：谢谢你，狗爷爷，不用找了。

en: Granddad Dog: Thank you, Daddy Pig.
cn: 狗爷爷：谢谢你，猪爸爸。

en: Granddad Dog: Goodbye.
cn: 狗爷爷：再见。

en: Daddy Pig: Goodbye.
cn: 猪爸爸：再见。

en: Mummy Pig: Goodbye.
cn: 猪妈妈：再见。

en: Peppa Pig: Bye-bye.
cn: 佩奇：再见。

en: Daddy Pig: It’s good to get our old car back again.
cn: 猪爸爸：能把我们的老车开回来真好。

sentence.en: It’s good to get our old car back again.
sentence.cn: 能把我们的老车开回来真好。

examples.en: It’s good to get my old toy back again.
examples.cn: 能把我的旧玩具拿回来真好。

examples.en: It’s good to get my old book back again.
examples.cn: 能把我的旧书拿回来真好。

en: Peppa Pig: I like the new car, but I like our old car better.
cn: 佩奇：我喜欢新车，但我更喜欢我们的老车。

sentence.en: I like our old car better.

examples.en: I like my old bike better.
examples.cn: 我更喜欢我的旧自行车。

examples.en: I like my old computer better.

en: Daddy Pig: And I think our old car likes us too. Don’t you.
cn: 猪爸爸：我觉得我们的老车也喜欢我们，对吧。
